interface.name: zwlr_output_power_manager_v1

description.summary: manager to create per-output power management

interface.description: This interface is a manager that allows creating per-output power management mode controls.

request.name: get_output_power

description.summary: get a power management for an output

request.description: Create a output power management mode control that can be used to adjust the power management mode for a given output.

request.name: destroy
request.description: All objects created by the manager will still remain valid, until their specific destroy request has been received.

interface.name: zwlr_output_power_v1

description.summary: adjust power management mode for an output

interface.description: This interface allows changing the power management mode for an output.

entry.name: on
entry.summary: Output is turned on, no power saving.

request.name: set_mode

description.summary: Set the power management mode for this output

request.description:
Set the power management mode for this output.
The new mode is applied immediately.

event.name: mode

description.summary: Report a power management mode change

event.description:
Report a power management mode change.
This event is sent immediately when the object is created so that a client is informed about the current power management mode. It is also sent when the mode changes, for example when the power management mode is changed via the set_mode request or by the compositor itself.

event.name: failed
event.description:
This event indicates that the output power management mode control is no longer valid. This can happen for a number of reasons, including: - The output is capable of changing power management modes, but this client is not allowed to change it. - The output is no longer capable of changing power management modes.
The client should exit or look for other power management modes controls.

request.name: destroy
request.description: This request indicates that the client will no longer use this output power management object.
